Sentencas: The process design, simulation, and control of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)/gas turbine (GT) hybrid power generation system combined with a compressed-fuel processing unit (CFPU) are presented.
Titulo: Design and Control of an SOFC/GT Hybrid Power Generation System with Low Carbon Emissions

Sentencas: Given that CO2 is the input of the CFPU, the net CO2 emissions of this hybrid power system are suppressed under 324.2 g of CO2/kWh.
Titulo: Design and Control of an SOFC/GT Hybrid Power Generation System with Low Carbon Emissions

Sentencas: Using the combined heat and power (CHP) approach, the hybrid power efficiency increases from 33% to 50%.
Titulo: Design and Control of an SOFC/GT Hybrid Power Generation System with Low Carbon Emissions

Sentencas: Based on a single-input single-output (SISO) control configuration, an inferential power control strategy using a static inferential model is implemented to improve the accuracy of the power estimation and effectively regulates the SOFC power output.
Titulo: Design and Control of an SOFC/GT Hybrid Power Generation System with Low Carbon Emissions
